timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT To fill a full hunger bar, this value must be at least 2.
          
      
    
    
  

Redundant.
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,26 +14,58 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_4174 net/minecraft/item/FoodComponent ARG 5 snack ARG 6 statusEffects METHOD method_19230 getHunger ()I + COMMENT Gets the amount of hunger a food item will fill. + COMMENT + COMMENT

One hunger is equivilant to half of a hunger bar icon. + COMMENT To fill a full hunger bar, this value must be at least 2.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT Checks a food item can be eaten regardless of the current hunger value.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT Checks if a food item can be eaten when the current hunger bar is full.
          
      
    
    
  

Afaik in vanilla this limit is always "hunger value is full", and if there is no other restriction on hunger value we can just describe this specific case.
Ignore me if there can be other restrictions on hunger values aside from being not full.
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,26 +14,58 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_4174 net/minecraft/item/FoodComponent ARG 5 snack ARG 6 statusEffects METHOD method_19230 getHunger ()I + COMMENT Gets the amount of hunger a food item will fill. + COMMENT + COMMENT

One hunger is equivilant to half of a hunger bar icon. + COMMENT To fill a full hunger bar, this value must be at least 2. METHOD method_19231 getSaturationModifier ()F + COMMENT Gets the staturation modifier of a food item. + COMMENT + COMMENT

This value is typically used to determine how long a player can sustain the current hunger value before the hunger is used. METHOD method_19232 isMeat ()Z + COMMENT Checks if a food item can be fed to dogs. METHOD method_19233 isAlwaysEdible ()Z + COMMENT Checks a food item can be eaten regardless of the current hunger value.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change COMMENT

The second value is a percentage change the status effect is applied on a scale between {@code 0.0F} and {@code 1.0F} COMMENT

The second value is the chance the status effect gets applied, on a scale between {@code 0.0F} and {@code 1.0F}. Should be chance I think? Like 80% hunger for rotten flesh?
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:

One hunger is equivilant to half of a hunger bar icon. + COMMENT To fill a full hunger bar, this value must be at least 2. METHOD method_19231 getSaturationModifier ()F + COMMENT Gets the staturation modifier of a food item. + COMMENT + COMMENT

This value is typically used to determine how long a player can sustain the current hunger value before the hunger is used. METHOD method_19233 isAlwaysEdible ()Z + COMMENT Checks a food item can be eaten regardless of the current hunger value. METHOD method_19234 isSnack ()Z + COMMENT Checks if a food item is snack-like and is eaten quickly. METHOD method_19235 getStatusEffects ()Ljava/util/List; + COMMENT Gets a list of all status effect instances that may be applied when a food item is consumed. + COMMENT + COMMENT

The first value in the pair is the status effect instance to be applied. + COMMENT

The second value is a percentage change the status effect is applied on a scale between {@code 0.0F} and {@code 1.0F}
